name: Bangkok, Thailand
description: Often topping lists of the world's most visited cities, Bangkok is famed for its vibrant street life, cultural landmarks, and bustling markets

name: Paris, France
description: Known as the City of Love, Paris is perennially popular for its world-class art, cuisine, and landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre Museum

name: London, England
description: With attractions like the British Museum, the London Eye, and Buckingham Palace, London consistently draws millions of tourists each year

name: Dubai, UAE
description: Known for its futuristic architecture, luxury shopping, and vibrant nightlife, Dubai is a hub for international tourists

name: Singapore
description: This city-state attracts visitors with its clean streets, gardens, and a blend of Malay, Chinese, and Indian cultural influences

name: New York City, USA
description: Home to iconic sites such as Times Square, Central Park, and the Statue of Liberty, NYC is a top destination for global travelers

name: Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
description: The capital city of Malaysia is famous for its diverse culture, shopping districts, and landmarks like the Petronas Twin Towers

name: Istanbul, Turkey
description: Straddling Europe and Asia, Istanbul is rich in history and culture, with attractions like the Hagia Sophia and the Blue Mosque

name: Tokyo, Japan
description: Tokyo offers a unique blend of traditional and modern attractions, including temples, skyscrapers, and famously bustling crossings like Shibuya

name: Antalya, Turkey
description: Known for its stunning Mediterranean coastline, historic sites, and resorts, Antalya is a favorite among vacationers seeking sun and sea
